name: Glimber The Climper
description:
Glimber The Climper is a pretty hard game, with very special physics. The game isn't very long but it's intense. Your courage and coldness will be put to the test. Will you be able to make it to the end? And will you be able to find the five secret rooms of the game...

I just want to wish you good luck and a good game on Glimber The Climper.

Looking for any kind of feedback and support!

If you have any questions you can ask me here.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TwigWallder

If you want to make a donation, you can do it here.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/twigwallder

Minimum System Requirements:

OS Requirements:

Windows 7 or higher

Install Instructions:

Windows:

1 - Download the zip .

2 - Extract .

3 - Run GlimberTheClimper.exe .
